content.text:
Done. The structure is now:

- `~/.config/claude/` - actual XDG-compliant location with stowed configs
- `~/.claude` → `dotfiles/stow/claude/.claude` → `.config/claude` - symlink chain for Claude Code compatibility

Claude Code will write to `~/.claude/` which resolves to `~/.config/claude/`, and your managed configs (CLAUDE.md, settings.json, plugins) are stowed there.

Want me to commit this change?

content.content:
diff --git a/stow/claude/.claude/CLAUDE.md b/stow/claude/.claude/CLAUDE.md
deleted file mode 100644
index cc7709b1..00000000
--- a/stow/claude/.claude/CLAUDE.md
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,23 +0,0 @@
-- In all interactions and commit messages, be extremely concise and sacrifice grammar for the sake of concision.
-
-## GitHub
-
-- your primary method for interacting with GitHub is github CLI
-
-## Git
-
-- When creating branches, prefix them with riethmayer/ to indicate they came from me
-
-## Plans
-
-- At the end of each plan, give me a list of unresolved questions to answer, if any. Make the questions extremely concise and sacrifice grammer for the sake of concision.
-
-## Brag Book
-
-- Track work in `$XDG_DATA_HOME/brag-book/` (`~/.local/share/brag-book/`)
-- Daily JSONL files: `{date}.jsonl` (e.g., `2025-11-20.jsonl`)
-- Categories: strategy, culture, execution
-- Entry format: `{"timestamp": "HH:MM:SS", "category": "...", "summary": "...", "source": "hook|manual", "session_id": "..."}`
-- Use `brag` command to add entries manually
-- Stop hook auto-captures via `brag-capture-stop` (uses `claude -p` CLI)
-
diff --git a/stow/claude/.claude/plugins/config.json b/stow/claude/.claude/plugins/config.json
deleted file mode 100644
index 7a0e8836..00000000
--- a/stow/claude/.claude/plugins/config.json
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,3 +0,0 @@
-{
-  "repositories": {}
-}
\ No newline at end of file
diff --git a/stow/claude/.claude/settings.json b/stow/claude/.claude/settings.json
deleted file mode 100644
index 7474b456..00000000
--- a/stow/claude/.claude/settings.json
+++ /dev/null
@@ -1,9 +0,0 @@
-{
-  "enabledPlugins": {
-    "earlybird-shared@earlybird-marketplace": true,
-    "earlybird-product-management@earlybird-marketplace": true,
-    "document-skills@anthropic-agent-skills": true,
-    "example-skills@anthropic-agent-skills": true
-  },
-  "alwaysThinkingEnabled": true
-}

input.command:
git -C /Users/janriethmayer/dotfiles add stow/claude/ && git -C /Users/janriethmayer/dotfiles commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Restructure claude stow package for XDG compliance

~/.claude now symlinks to ~/.config/claude
EOF
)"
